Class-Ranger 20 -- Female Skilled Human Ranger: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +3 Constitution: +4 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +3 Charisma: +4
Background: Cook Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 19452/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 10/15
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Hardy Traveler: +1 Encumbered Bulk/+1 Maximum Bulk
Favored Terrain (Desert): Moves normally over difficult terrain caused by sand without a need to Balance
Hardy Traveler: +10' Speed during overland travel
Terrain Master: Can train for 1 hr to make current terrain favored until spending a day away from it
Ultimate Skirmisher: Moves normally over difficult, greater difficult, and hazardous terrain
Unimpeded Journey: Moves normally over non-magical difficult terrain

Feature Notes:
Advanced General Training: +1 General Feat (7th level)
Ancestral Paragon: +1 Ancestry Feat
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
General Feats: 5 selections
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Hunter's Edge: 1 selection
Ranger Feats: 11 selections
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Animal Companion: Has a young animal companion that gains Hunt Prey and Flurry, Precision, and Outwit effects
Incredible Companion: Animal Companion has choice of nimble or savage characteristics
Mature Animal Companion: Animal Companion is a mature companion and may Stride or Strike without a command
Ranger Key Attribute: 1 selection
Specialized Companion: Animal Companion has choice of specialization
Train Animal: Can use days of training and a successful Nature check to teach an animal to perform a trick
Perception: +31 (wisdom; legendary)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +3 (dexterity; untrained) Engineering Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Occultism: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Fishing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +4 (charisma; untrained)
Astronomy Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Games Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Piloting Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +4 (strength; untrained) Heraldry Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +3 (wisdom; untrained)
Butchering Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Intimidation: +4 (charisma; untrained) Society: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Cooking Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: +27 (wisdom; expert) Stabling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Crafting: +26 (intelligence; trained) Mercantile Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Stealth: +29 (dexterity; master)
Deception: +26 (charisma; trained) Mountain Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +31 (wisdom; legendary)
Diplomacy: +4 (charisma; untrained) Nature: +31 (wisdom; legendary) Thievery: +3 (dexterity; untrained)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Butchering Lore): Skill Legendary (Butchering Lore)
Additional Lore (Engineering Lore): Skill Legendary (Engineering Lore)
Additional Lore (Mercantile Lore): Skill Legendary (Mercantile Lore)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Perception Legend: Perception Legendary
Perception Mastery: Perception Master
Ranger Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Survival; Choose 8 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Fishing Lore): Skill Trained (Fishing Lore)
Skill Training (Mountain Lore): Skill Trained (Mountain Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Additional Recollection: Successful Recall Knowledge on hunted prey gives a Recall Knowledge check on another creature
Animal Empathy: Can use Diplomacy with animals to Make An Impression and to make simple Requests
Assurance (Cooking Lore): Can take an automatic 32 on Cooking Lore checks
Camouflage: Can use Hide and Sneak in natural terrain without cover
Experienced Tracker: Can Track at full Speed/Can Track without hourly Survival checks
Forager: Failures and critical failures on Survival to Subsist are successes/Subsist successes provide for self and 32 others, or twice that number with a critical success
Hazard Finder: +1 Perception to find traps/Automatically attempts Search to find traps
Hunt Prey: (1) Gives +2 Perception to Seek and +2 Survival to Track a designated creature until next daily prep
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Master Monster Hunter: Can use Nature to Recall Knowledge to identify any creature
Masterful Hunter: With master proficiency, gains +4 Perception to Seek hunted prey, +4 Survival to Track hunted prey, and +4 Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, and Recall Knowledge checks on hunted prey
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
Outwit: +2 Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, and Recall Knowledge checks with hunted prey
Seasoned: +1 to Craft food and drink
Sense The Unseen: (R) Makes undetected foes hidden after a failed Seek
Shadow Hunter: Has continuous concealment from foes other than hunted prey in natural surroundings
Stealthy Companion: Companion gains benefits of Camouflage, and an ambusher companion gains an increase in Stealth rank
Survey Wildlife: Can use Survival to Recall Knowledge about local creatures after 10 min of study
Swift Tracker: Can Track at full Speed without hourly Survival checks/Can perform other exploration activities while tracking
Terrain Expertise (Cave): +1 Survival in Cave
Terrain Expertise (Swamp): +1 Survival in Swamp
To The Ends Of The Earth: Can follow hunted prey across any distance
Trackless Journey: Has continuous benefits of the Cover Tracks action while moving at full Speed in natural terrain
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures on any trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master rank provide additional information
Warden's Guidance: While observing hunted prey, ally failures and critical failures to Seek prey are successes
Warden's Step: Can include allies in an Avoid Notice action in natural terrain
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (2 max); master) Class DC: Ranger: 26 (%1; %2)
Armor: Scale Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Bola (+29 1d6+4 B R40'; dexterity; master); Morningstar (+30 1d6+4 B/P; strength; master); Spear (+30 1d6+4 P R40'; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Far Shot: Doubles ranged weapon increments
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Legendary Monster Hunter: Has increased Monster Hunter effects
Martial Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Masterful Companion: Gives companion Masterful Hunter effects vs. hunted prey
Masterful Hunter: Class Master (Ranger)
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Medium Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Multitalented: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Ranger Expertise: Class Expert (Ranger)
Ranger Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Hand Crossbow as one category simpler
Blind-Fight: Can attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 flat check/Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden foes/Treats adjacent undetected creatures up to level 20 as hidden instead
Companion's Cry: Can use 2 actions for Command an Animal to give companion an additional action
Crossbow Ace: (1) Uses Create A Diversion or Take Cover, then Interact to reload a crossbow
Deadly Aim: (1) Ranged Strike with a -2 penalty vs. hunted prey inflicts +8 HP damage
Disrupt Prey: (R) Makes a melee Strike on hunted prey within reach that uses a manipulate or move action or leaves a square while moving; success disrupts the action
Distracting Shot: Critical or double hit on hunted prey inflicts off-guard for 1 rd
Double Prey: Can use Hunt Prey on two targets
Double Shot: (2) Makes two ranged Strikes against different foes at the current multiple attack penalty -2
Favored Prey: Can use Hunt Prey with chosen creature type as a free action during initiative
Flurry: Reduces multiple attack penalties vs. hunted prey to -3 and -6, or -2 and -4 with an agile weapon
Greater Distracting Shot: Ranged hit on hunted prey inflicts off-guard for 1 rd, or until the end of the next turn on a critical success or double hit
Hazard Finder: +1 Armor Class vs. traps
Hunt Prey: (1) Suffers no distance penalty for ranged Strikes in the 2nd range increment vs. a designated creature until next daily prep
Hunted Shot: (1) Makes two ranged Strikes against hunted prey
Hunter's Aim: (2) +2 ranged Strike ignores concealment of hunted prey
Impossible Flurry: (3) While wielding 2 weapons, makes 3 melee Strikes at the maximum multiple attack penalty
Impossible Volley: (3) Ranged Strike with a -2 penalty attacks all foes in a 10' radius
Improved Twin Riposte: Gives an additional Reaction to make a Twin Riposte once per turn
Legendary Shot: Ignores five range increments when attacking hunted prey with a master proficiency weapon
Manifold Edge: Can use a different Hunter's Edge benefit with Hunt Prey
Master Monster Hunter: Monster Hunter effects take effect on a normal success
Masterful Hunter: Suffers no distance penalty when attacking hunted prey in the 3rd range increment of a ranged weapon with master proficiency/Reduces multiple attack penalties vs. hunted prey with master weapon proficiency to -2 and -4, or -1 and -2 with an agile weapon/+2 Armor Class vs. a hunt prey target with master armor proficiency/2nd and 3rd hits on hunted prey inflict +2d8 HP and +1d8 HP precision damage
Monster Hunter: Can use Recall Knowledge as part of Hunt Prey; critical success gives +2 attack to self and allies for 1 rd once per target per day
Monster Warden: Successful use of Monster Hunter also gives self and allies +2 Armor Class on next attack and +2 on next save vs. hunted prey
Nature's Edge: Foes suffer flat-footed vs. self in difficult terrain
Outwit: +1 Armor Class vs. hunted prey
Penetrating Shot: (2) Strike affects both a target and a creature giving it lesser cover
Perfect Shot: (3) Ranged Strike on hunted prey inflicts maximum damage on success and ends turn
Precision: First hit on hunted prey each rd inflicts +3d8 HP precision damage
Quick Draw: (1) Draws a weapon and Strikes
Ranger Weapon Expertise: Critical hits with a simple weapon, martial weapon, or unarmed attack vs. hunted prey inflict its critical specialization effect
Running Reload: (1) Reloads during a Stride, Step, or Sneak
Scout's Warning: (F) Gives allies +1 initiative
Second Sting: (1) Failed Strike against hunted prey with a weapon in one hand inflicts the non-dice damage of the weapon in the other
Shared Prey: Can share with an ally the benefits of Hunt Prey and Flurry, Outwit, or Precision on a single target
Side By Side: Self and companion automatically flank a foe adjacent to both
Skirmish Strike: (1) Steps before or after a Strike
Snap Shot: Can use a ranged weapon during a Reaction to Strike an adjacent creature
Swift Prey: Can use Hunt Prey as a free action at the beginning of a turn
Triple Shot: Uses Double Shot against a single target, or uses three actions to make three ranged Strikes at the current multiple attack penalty -4
Twin Parry: (1) Parrying with one melee weapon in each hand gives +1 Armor Class for 1 rd, or +2 Armor Class if either weapon has the parry trait
Twin Riposte: (R) Twin Parry allows Striking or Disarming a foe who critically fails a Strike on self
Twin Takedown: (1) Makes a melee Strike with each hand against hunted prey
Warden's Boon: (1) Shares Hunt Prey and Hunter's Edge benefits with an ally for 1 rd
Warden's Reload: (F) Casting a warden spell allows reloading a crossbow
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, and +8 HP damage with expert, master, and legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +31 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +27 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Greater Natural Reflexes: Save Legendary (Reflex)
Natural Reflexes: Save Master (Reflex)
Warden's Endurance: Save Master (Fortitude)
Will Expertise: Save Expert (Will)
Greater Natural Reflexes: Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures, and suffers half normal damage from failed Reflex saves
Hazard Finder: +1 vs. trap effects
Natural Reflexes: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Ultimate Skirmisher: Never triggers movement-triggered traps
Warden's Endurance: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Magic
Magic Notes:
Advanced Warden: Knows choice of advanced warden spell/+1 Focus Points
Masterful Warden: Knows choice of warden spell/+1 Focus Points
Peerless Warden: Knows choice of peerless warden spell/+1 Focus Points
Heroic Presence: (1) R30' Generates the effects of a 6th-level Zealous Conviction on 10 willing creatures once per day
Initiate Warden: Knows choice of warden spell/Has a focus pool with at least 1 Focus Point
Warden's Focus: Refocus restores all focus points
Notes
